languages.text: "Верно. Я не столь великодушен к своим врагам, как ты, {name}". {n}Винтерскейл ядовито усмехается, глядя вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Если бы ксеносы напали на столицу моего протектората, я бы не был столь бесхребетен в вопросе отмщения. Мне даже почти интересно, что заставляет тебя пресмыкаться предо мной, выпрашивая их прощение".

traits.locale_text: "Верно. Я не столь великодушен к своим врагам, как ты, {name}". {n}Винтерскей ядовито усмехается, глядя вам прямо в галаза.{/n} "Если бы ксеносы напали на столицу моей торговой империи, я бы не был столь бесхребетен в вопросе отмщения. Мне даже почти интересно, что заставляет тебя пресмыкаться предо мной, выпрашивая их прощение".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Я не столь великодушен к своим врагам, как ты, {name}". {n}Винтерскейл ядовито усмехается, глядя вам прямо в глаза.{/n} "Если бы ксеносы напали на столицу моего протектората, я бы не был столь бесхребетен в вопросе отмщения. Мне даже почти интересно, что заставляет тебя пресмыкаться предо мной, выпрашивая их прощение".

traits.locale_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}. {n}Winterscale sneers venomously, staring you straight in the eyes.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless when it comes to revenge. I'm even almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging for their forgiveness."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

I'm even almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging for their forgiveness."

I'm even almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging for their forgiveness."

I'm even almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging for their forgiveness."

I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «Cierto. No soy tan generoso con mis enemigos como usted, {name}». {n}Winterscale te mira fijamente a los ojos con un desdén ponzoñoso.{/n} «Si unos xenos atacasen la capital de mi protectorado, no sería tan pusilánime a la hora de vengarme. Casi siento curiosidad por saber qué le hace humillarse ante mí para rogarme perdón en su nombre».
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: «Cierto. No soy tan generoso con mis enemigos como usted, {name}». {n}Winterscale te mira fijamente a los ojos con un desprecio ponzoñoso.{/n} «Si unos xenos atacasen la capital de mi protectorado, no sería tan pusilánime a la hora de desquitarme. Casi siento curiosidad por saber qué le hace humillarse ante mí para rogarme que les perdone».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “没错，我对敌人可不像你那么仁慈，{name}。”{n}温特斯凯尔恶毒地嗤笑着，直勾勾地盯着你的眼睛。{/n}“如果异形袭击了我的王朝首都，我才不会在复仇的时候这么畏畏缩缩。我甚至有点好奇，到底出于什么原因，你竟然会在我面前卑躬屈膝，乞求宽恕他们？”
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: “没错，我对敌人可不像你那么仁慈，{name}。”{n}温特斯凯尔恶毒地冷笑着，直勾勾地盯着你的眼睛。{/n}“如果异形袭击了我的王朝首都，我才不会在复仇的时候这么畏畏缩缩。我甚至有点好奇，到底出于什么原因，你竟然会在我面前卑躬屈膝，乞求宽恕他们？”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « En effet. Je ne suis pas aussi généreux que vous avec mes ennemis, {name}. {n}Winterscale vous regarde droit dans les yeux avec un rictus fielleux.{/n} Si les xénos avaient attaqué la capitale de mon protectorat, je ne me montrerais pas aussi laxiste avec eux. Je me demande presque ce qui vous pousse à ramper devant moi à quémander leur pardon. »
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: « C'est juste. Je ne suis pas aussi généreux que vous avec mes ennemis, {name}. » {n}Winterscale vous regarde droit dans les yeux avec un rictus fielleux.{/n} « Si les xénos avaient attaqué la capitale de mon protectorat, je ne me montrerais pas aussi laxiste avec eux. Je me demande presque ce qui vous pousse à ramper devant moi en quémandant leur pardon. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「その通りだ。俺はお前ほど敵に寛大じゃあないのさ、{name}」{n}ウィンタースケールは毒づくように嘲笑し、あなたの目をまっすぐに見つめる。{/n}「もし異種族が俺の保護領の首都を攻撃していたなら、俺は復これほど無慈悲な報復はしなかっただろう。なぜ彼らのために、俺にひれ伏してまで許しを請う理由が何なのか、興味すら湧いてくる」
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ。俺はお前ほど敵に寛大じゃあないのさ、{name}」{n}ウィンタースケールは毒づくように嘲笑し、あなたの目をまっすぐに見つめる。{/n}「もし異種族が俺の保護領の首都を攻撃していたなら、俺は復これほど無慈悲な報復はしなかっただろう。なぜ彼らのために、俺にひれ伏してまで許しを請う理由が何なのか、興味すら湧いてくる」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Stimmt. Ich bin nicht so großzügig mit meinen Feinden wie Ihr, {name}." {n}Winterzunder verzieht giftig das Gesicht und starrt dir mitten in die Augen.{/n} "Hätten die Xenos die Hauptstadt meines Protektorats angegriffen, wäre ich nicht so rückgratlos gewesen, was meine Rache angeht. Fast bin ich neugierig, warum Ihr vor mir buckelt und in ihrem Namen um meine Vergebung bettelt."
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."

traits.locale_text: "Stimmt. Ich bin nicht so großzügig mit meinen Feinden wie Ihr, {name}." {n}Winterzunder verzieht giftig das Gesicht und starrt dir mitten in die Augen.{/n} "Hätten die Xenos die Hauptstadt meines Protektorats angegriffen, wäre ich nicht so rückgratlos gewesen, was meine Rache angeht. Fast bin ich neugierig, warum Ihr vor mir buckelt und um ihre Vergebung bettelt."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Düşmanlarıma senin kadar cömert yaklaşmadığım doğru {name}." {n}Winterscale, ağzından zehirler saçarak gülerken doğruca gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Zenolar, protektoramın başkentine saldırsalardı karşılık vermede bu kadar metanetsiz davranmazdım. Hatta böyle ayaklarıma kapanarak onlar adına af dilemene neyin neden olduğunu merak bile ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "True. I am not as generous with my enemies as you are, {name}." {n}Winterscale scoffs venomously, staring you straight in the eye.{/n} "Had the xenos attacked the capital of my protectorate, I would not be so spineless in my retribution. I am almost curious as to what makes you grovel before me, begging my forgiveness on their behalf."
